Gridsettings Class Reference

#include <griddlg.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

c_des: Class griddlg.cpp. c_des: This class is used to show a gridsettings dialog, in which the grid spacing, gridcolour, c_des: and backgroundcolour can be given.
